mView.MWeb module¶

class mView.MWeb.web[source]¶

Organizes global variables. Allows all other classes to easily access important parameters central to mView. Stores and opens all data.

devices = []¶
gui = None¶
guiRefreshRate = 1¶
limitDict = {}¶

scrnWidth = None¶

title = None¶
virtualDevices = []¶
